title: Balcony unit on Piedmont border, gas fireplace, close to freeway/bus
map_address: 360 Monte Vista Avenue near Harrison Street
posting_body: ['COVID-19 VIEWING PROCEDURES:', '* To protect staff and tenants, we are continuing to follow Covid protocols.', '* Viewings will be by appointment only.', 'Please email us for an appointment.', 'You must have a confirmation from us before showing up.', 'No unscheduled viewings.', '*', 'All visitors must wear face masks regardless of vaccination status.', 'If you don’t wear a mask, you will not be permitted entry.', '* To avoid overlapping appointments and ensure social distancing, any applications will need to be filled out off-site and dropped off at management company office mail slot, near Telegraph Ave. and 29th.', 'Street.', 'EMAIL US TO REQUEST AN APPOINTMENT', 'Please indicate your general availability over next few days.', '360 Monte Vista Avenue, APT 202', '1 Bedroom, 1 bath', '$1995/month', '$2100/deposit', 'No unscheduled drop-ins.', 'ABOUT THE APARTMENT', "This won't last long, so don't wait!", 'Second floor, 1BR/1Bath apartment priced to move!', 'Located directly on the Grand Lake/Piedmont border, this is a', 'quiet', "building in one of Oakland's best rental areas.", 'This unit has a great layout, with excellent separation between the living and bedroom areas.', 'Living room has a striking mid-century gas fireplace as a focal point.', 'Walk-through kitchen with room for a table in dining/breakfast area.', 'Generous cabinet space, stone countertops, dishwasher, refrigerator, garbage disposal, and full-size bathtub.', 'Bedroom has a walk-in style closet.', 'This is an elevator building.', 'Laundry on-site, with a coin-free, electronic payment system.', 'This is a non-smoking unit.', 'For the health and comfort of all our tenants, we take smoking and noise complaints VERY seriously in this building.', 'COMMUTING', 'Easy freeway access nearby.', 'San Francisco Casual Carpool, Local and TransBay bus stops right at the corner.', 'Twelve-minute bus ride to 19th Street BART.', 'PARKING', 'Not included, but optional gated, underground garage parking available for an extra $95/month.', 'One space available.', 'Street parking on block does not require permit or meters.', '(Sorry, no electric car charging available.)', 'GREAT NEIGHBORHOOD', 'Desirable, walkable neighborhood, just a block from the Morcom Rose Garden.', 'Lake Merritt is a 20-minute stroll away.', 'Just up the hill from Piedmont and Grand Avenues with many shops, Kaiser Oakland, grocery stores, dry cleaners, banks, cafes and many, many restaurants.', "Safeway, Trader Joe's and Whole Foods are all just a 5 minute drive away.", 'BUILDING AMENITIES', '- Elevator', '- Underground, gated garage (extra $95/space)', "- Women's and men's SAUNAS in building with 24-hour access.", '- Two laundry rooms', '- Shared outdoor courtyard', '- Locked building entry', '- Resident manager and on-call handyman.', '(No doorman, concierge or security guard.)', 'MISC.', '* $20 application fee per adult, payable by personal check.', '* All applicants must visit in person before applying.', 'No long-distance, site-unseen rentals.', '* Cats OK.', 'Sorry, NO DOGS, even small ones.', '* Water, composting and trash/recycling included.', "* Tenants may NOT sublet/rent out apartments, in whole or in part, on AirBnB, VRBO, or any other 'sharing' service.", 'If you are reading this on a website other than Craigslist, the listing has been copied without permission and may contain errors.', 'Descriptions and template in this advertisement are proprietary marketing materials, and may not be copied or modified.']
